items.sentence: You\'ll be all right again in a couple of days.
Tom says he can\'t ignore the noise any longer.
Tom says he can\'t ignore the smell any longer.
Tom may need to stay in Boston a little longer.
Tom needed to be told several times to do that.
The price of oil has dipped below $30 a barrel.
The security guards wrestled Tom to the ground.
Tom staggered across the finish line exhausted.
Tom started to walk away, but Mary stopped him.
Tom switched off the light to save electricity.
